message.body: (1/2) Hey. Just wondering if fixing a leaking water fill valve on a dishwasher is in your area of expertise? And if so, if you might have time to do that this

Hey Tabitha . I'm not sure if i would be able to fix that or not. I'm going to Florida this week so I can't take a look at it til next week. I would see if Danophonic Dan could do it. He is relatively inexpensive for a plumber
Do you have his contact info?
That's prob the same Dan that Adam knows? I think I have the number . Completely forgot about that. Thanks!
Yeah same dude. I have his # if you need it but I can't recall his last name right now
I just found it in my phone. Thanks!
